comments:
20031007

I select a CVS connection and choose 'Discard location' from the context menu.
Nothing happens, the connection stays there.

In the log:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Okt 08, 2003 12:30:00.238
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.model.RemoteContentProvider.cancelJobs(RemoteContentProvider.java:133)

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.repo.RemoveRootAction.run(RemoveRootAction.java:115)

	at
org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$4(ActionContributionItem.java:496)

This happens when background fetching is off. We didn't properly check before 
attempting to cancel jobs. Fix is in HEAD.
